verses.verse: For we <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G1919>earthly<s%> <S%G4636>tent<s%> which is our <S%G3614>house<s%> is <S%G2647>torn<s%> <S%G2647>down,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3619>building<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> a <S%G3614>house<s%> not <S%G886>made<s%> with <S%G886>hands,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> in the <S%G3772>heavens.<s%>
For <S%G2532>indeed<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> [house] we <S%G4727>groan,<s%> <S%G1971>longing<s%> to be <S%G1902>clothed<s%> with our <S%G3613>dwelling<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven;<s%>
<S%G1489>inasmuch<s%> as we, having <S%G1746>put<s%> it on, shall not be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1131>naked.<s%>

For <S%G2532>indeed<s%> while we are in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G4636>tent,<s%> we <S%G4727>groan,<s%> being <S%G916>burdened,<s%> <S%G1909>because<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we do not <S%G2309>want<s%> to be <S%G1562>unclothed,<s%> but to be <S%G1902>clothed,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G2349>what<s%> is <S%G2349>mortal<s%> may be <S%G2666>swallowed<s%> up by <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> He who <S%G2716>prepared<s%> us for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> purpose is <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G1325>gave<s%> to us the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> as a <S%G728>pledge.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> being <S%G3842>always<s%> of <S%G2292>good<s%> <S%G2292>courage,<s%> and <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that while we are at <S%G1736>home<s%> in the <S%G4983>body<s%> we are <S%G1553>absent<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> –
for we <S%G4043>walk<s%> by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> not by <S%G1491>sight<s%> –

we are of <S%G2292>good<s%> <S%G2292>courage,<s%> I say, and <S%G2106>prefer<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to be <S%G1553>absent<s%> from the <S%G4983>body<s%> and to be at <S%G1736>home<s%> with the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G5389>have<s%> as our <S%G5389>ambition,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> at <S%G1736>home<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1553>absent,<s%> to be <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> to Him.

For we <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> may be <S%G2865>recompensed<s%> for his deeds in the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G4314>according<s%> to <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G2041>has<s%> <S%G4238>done,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G5337>bad.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> we <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> but we are <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%> and I <S%G1679>hope<s%> that we are <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in your <S%G4893>consciences.<s%>

We are not <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4921>commending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> to you but [are] <S%G1325>giving<s%> you an <S%G874>occasion<s%> to be <S%G2745>proud<s%> of us, that you may <S%G2192>have<s%> [an answer] for <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2744>take<s%> <S%G2744>pride<s%> in <S%G4383>appearance,<s%> and not in <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
For <S%G1535>if<s%> we are <S%G1839>beside<s%> <S%G1839>ourselves,<s%> it is for <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G1535>if<s%> we are of <S%G4993>sound<s%> <S%G4993>mind,<s%> it is for you.

For the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4912>controls<s%> us, having <S%G2919>concluded<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G599>died;<s%>

and He <S%G599>died<s%> for <S%G3956>all,<s%> that they who <S%G2198>live<s%> should <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> but for Him who <S%G599>died<s%> and <S%G1453>rose<s%> <S%G1453>again<s%> on their <S%G5228>behalf.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> from <S%G3568>now<s%> on we <S%G3609>recognize<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> we have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> [Him] [thus] <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> [he is] a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2937>creature;<s%> the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G744>things<s%> <S%G3928>passed<s%> <S%G3928>away;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2537>things<s%> have <S%G1096>come.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> [these] <S%G3956>things<s%> are from <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> us to <S%G1438>Himself<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> us the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation,<s%>

<S%G5613>namely,<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> was in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2644>reconciling<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G1438>Himself,<s%> not <S%G3049>counting<s%> their <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> against them, and He has <S%G5087>committed<s%> to us the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> we are <S%G4243>ambassadors<s%> for <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> were <S%G3870>entreating<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> us; we <S%G1189>beg<s%> you on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> be <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

He <S%G4160>made<s%> Him who <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> [to be] <S%G266>sin<s%> on our <S%G5228>behalf,<s%> that we might <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in Him.
